# #Form Control

<a id="scroll-to-form-control" />

### #API

<a id="scroll-to-form-control-api" />

```tsx
// wrapping with form control will give
// auto generated `id` to child components via context
;<FormControl>{children}</FormControl>

// to use autogenerated `id`,
// call form control context from the child component
import { FormControl } from '...'
const { id } = useContext(FormControl.Context)
```
